title: School Supplies for Orphans
details: Raising funds to buy school bags, notebooks, and uniforms for 100 orphans before the school year starts.

title: Clean Water for Upper Egypt
details: We aim to provide water filters to 30 families in remote villages suffering from polluted water sources.

title: Mobile App for Mental Health
details: Supporting families whose homes were destroyed by recent conflict by rebuilding 3 homes with basic facilities.

title: Rebuild Damaged Homes in Gaza
details: Funding the development of a mobile app that offers mental health support and resources in Arabic.

title: Empowering Women Through Sewing
details: Helping 10 women launch their sewing businesses by providing training and equipment

title: Free Coding Bootcamp in Alexandria
details: Organizing a free 8-week bootcamp to teach programming to unemployed youth in Alexandria

title: Arabic Children's Storybook Series
details: Creating a colorful, culturally-relevant storybook series in Arabic to encourage reading among kids aged 4–8.

title: Cairo Street Animal Shelter
details: Funding a new shelter in Cairo for stray cats and dogs, with veterinary care and adoption services

title: Solar Lights for Sinai Villages
details: Installing solar-powered street lights in remote villages in South Sinai to improve safety and access at night.

title: Accessible Learning for the Visually Impaired
details: Producing Braille textbooks and audio lectures for blind students at Egyptian universities

title: Community Garden in Damietta
details: Transforming an empty lot into a green space where families can grow food, relax, and build community.

title: Medical Aid for Cancer Patients
details: Supporting low-income patients with chemotherapy treatment and transportation to cancer centers in Cairo.
